name: MixumUp
description:
In this game you mix Chemicubes, cubes that interact with other Chemicubes in various different ways. This game is all about experimenting so have fun doing that. . If you want to reset the simulation press enter. More Cubes and maybe even some more tools may be added in the future, feel free to tell me your ideas in the comments. I hope you enjoy this neat little game i made in 3 hours :)

Added: Knife, Purple Cube, Half Cubes for almost every Chemicube, Unstable Cube, Player Cube, and a bunch of new interactions
